Uses of Package
org.epochx.core

Packages that use org.epochx.core
org.epochx.core

Classes in org.epochx.core used by org.epochx.core
CrossoverManager
          This component is responsible for handling the crossover operation and for raising crossover events.
ElitismManager
          This component handles the elitism operation to ensure the survival of the most fit programs in a generation of an evolutionary run.
GenerationManager
          This component is responsible for carrying out single generations of an evolutionary run.
InitialisationManager
          This component manages the initialisation step of an evolutionary run and fires initialisation events.
Model
          Implementations of Model define a configuration for a set of evolutionary runs and provide the means to execute the runs.
MutationManager
          This component is responsible for handling the mutation operation and for firing mutation events.
PoolSelectionManager
          This component manages the selection of a breeding pool to undergo the genetic operators.
ReproductionManager
          This component manages the reproduction operation of selecting a program to survive into the next generation.
RunManager
          Instances of this class are responsible for executing single evolutionary runs.

          Implementations of Model define a configuration for a set of evolutionary runs and provide the means to execute the runs.
